content.text:
# Draft:Queen

Queen is an Indian romance musical action thriller war comedy film. The film stars Namrata Shirodkar, Abhishek Bachchan, Tiger Shroff, Shilpa Shetty in lead roles, with Sunny Deol, Kajol Devgn, Rani Mukerji, Bobby Deol, Bipasha Basu and Deepika Padukone in supporting roles.
Cast
*Namrata Shirodkar
*Abhishek Bachchan
*Tiger Shroff
*Shilpa Shetty
*Sunny Deol
*Kajol Devgn
*Rani Mukerji
*Bobby Deol
*Bipasha Basu
*Deepika Padukone
*Shreyas Talpade
*Kunal Khemu
*Johnny Lever
*Rajpal Yadav
